subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The experience of leaving college early for the N.B.A. has made at least one former player critical of a system that he believes too often hangs athletes out to dry.
snippet: The experience of leaving college early for the N.B.A. has made at least one former player critical of a system that he believes too often hangs athletes out to dry.
